title: Scotch broth
description: Warm up with a classic recipe for Scotch broth from The Hairy Bikers.
ingredients: 2 litres/3½ pints cold water or lamb stock
2 celery stalks, trimmed, cut in 2.5cm/1in pieces
1 heaped tsp sea salt flakes, plus extra to taste
½ savoy cabbage, trimmed, cored and finely shredded
